title: Traig tobacco for your help getting autographs.
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Traig tobacco for your help getting autographs.
posts.post_content:
so I am wanting to get something signed by any of the following players but am having a hard time doing it so i thought Id try this as an idea. Follow this link to see what I have available:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=149720[/url]
If you can get any of the below mentioned players for me on my item (Ill send you the item along with a SASE) I will trade you an agreed upon card from the list.
 I am looking for:

Cal Ripken
Barry Bonds
Rickey Henderson
George Brett
Waly Joyner
Steve Bedrosian
willie mcgee
Ryne Sandberg
Lenny dykstra (curently in jail)
Mel Hall (in jail)
Keith Hernandez
Kevin mcReynolds
Nolan Ryan
George Bell
 Mark Mcgwire
Jose Canseco
Ozzie Guillen
Ozzie Virgil
Robin Yount
Jim Rice
Brian Downing
email me at [url]milkit1@gmail.com[/url]

I know this is probably a long shot but would appreciate any help I can get. Also I know some of these players are doing shows where they are charging insane rates, I just cant bring myself to pay $150 for George Brett. .
thanks for your help! :)
Have most of these. Email sent
I should clarify, I am collecting signed 1988 starting lineup figures for my son. That is what i am looking to get signed. thanks :)
Jim Rice will be at the upcoming MAB Celebrity show.
bump, any takers? Just tell me whom you think you can get and we can work out a trade. thanks!
